snippet: The suspect, described as a man in his 50s, was arrested after the attack in Sogn and Fjordane County, the police said.
abstract: Norwegian police say they have arrested a knife-wielding man who hijacked a bus in western Norway and killed three people on board, including the bus driver.
lead_paragraph: The suspect, described as a man in his 50s, was arrested after the attack in Sogn and Fjordane County, the police said.

headline.main: Norway: Man With Knife Kills 3 After Hijacking a Bus
headline.print_headline: Norway: Man With Knife Kills 3 After Hijacking a Bus
